projects.title: GameGrid
projects.description: A dynamic gaming platform offering multiple browser-based games, user interaction, real-time stats, and seamless gameplay experience.

projects.title: Cervical-cancer-detection

projects.title: Garbage Management System
projects.description: The Garbage Management Website is a platform for citizens and municipalities to schedule pickups, track waste trucks, and report illegal dumping.
